input_output_options.title: Input/output options
input_output_options.description: Define where the pipeline should find input data and save output data.

input.description: Glob pattern matching pictures for classification
input.help_text: You will need to specify a path to the input images (PNG, JPEG) you want to classify. You can use a glob pattern to match multiple files (e.g. 'data/*.jpg').

outdir.description: The output folder where the results will be saved. You have to use absolute paths to storage on Cloud infrastructure.

prompts.description: Comma-separated list of prompts/labels for classification
prompts.help_text: Use this parameter to specify the labels you want to use for the classification (e.g. 'dog,cute_dog,cat') of the input images. The prompts have to be separated by commas.
